Waikato roads still deadliest in New Zealand according to Ministry of Transport https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-roads-still-deadliest-in-new-zealand-according-to-ministry-of-transport/E5DAQ4U6I5EBJE4AIRJPPX4SN4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-roads-still-deadliest-in-new-zealand-according-to-ministry-of-transport/E5DAQ4U6I5EBJE4AIRJPPX4SN4/ Maryana GarciaRoads in this region claimed 192 lives from 2022 to 2024. Tue, 07 Jan 2025 00:00:00 +0000 Waikato remains the New Zealand region with the highest road death toll despite a national drop in fatalities, according to the Ministry of Transport.
